column1: The application crashes when I try to upload a file.
I can't reset my password. The reset link doesn't work.
The website is very slow during peak hours.
I received an error message while processing payment.
The mobile app doesn't sync with the desktop version.
I need help with setting up two-factor authentication.
The search function returns irrelevant results.
I am unable to download the invoice from my account.
The user interface is confusing and hard to navigate.
I keep getting logged out automatically after a few minutes.
